text:
According to Servlet 2.3 Section 5,3, calling sendRedirect() or sendError()
should commit the response.  This code has been commented out in the
implementation with a FIXME comment that needs to be addressed.
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com

text:
This will require some refactoring that is too risky to do this close to
release.  Will be fixed in a 4.0.1 maintenance release.
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com

text: *** Bug 3844 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: remm@apache.org
